meanings.definition: Relating to the electrical activity of muscles.
meanings.sent1: The myoelectrical signals in his muscles helped the doctor understand his condition.
meanings.sent2: The myoelectrical activity in her muscles was measured during the experiment.
meanings.sent3: His myoelectrical muscles seemed to have a mind of their own, twitching unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: The myoelectrical nature of his muscles was like a symphony of electrical impulses.
meanings.sent5: The myoelectrical activity of muscles can be seen on a monitor during a medical test.

meanings.definition: Involving the generation of electrical signals in muscle tissue.
meanings.sent1: The myoelectrical stimulation therapy helped improve muscle function.
meanings.sent2: The myoelectrical signals in the muscle tissue were carefully monitored.
meanings.sent3: The myoelectrical dance of muscle fibers was mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent4: Her myoelectrical muscles hummed with energy, ready for action.
meanings.sent5: The myoelectrical impulses in muscle tissue can be detected with specialized equipment.
